programme.title: Celebrity Family Feud
programme.desc: The classic Family Feud format has entertained a generation, and this hilarious celebrity reboot sees Emmy-award winning talk show host Steve Harley at the helm, as your favourite celebrities and their families play the game, thinking on their feet and trying to second guess the general public.

programme.title: Arts 21
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S5
programme.desc: Returning season of the classic game show, hosted by Michael Strahan. With the help of their game partners, contestants paired with celebrities must guess words or phrases that appear on the show's pyramid-shaped gameboard to win money.

programme.title: Planet Action S2
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced 25min evergreen finished series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released.

programme.title: Clean It, Fix It
programme.desc: Master builder Tommy Walsh, together with expert pro cleaner Maxine Dwyer and creative carpenter Asher Edwards help real people make real home improvements, whatever the budget. Get smart, practical tips on home improvements that make your space work better for you.

programme.title: Chris Humfrey's Animal Instinct
programme.desc: The clock is ticking, as Chris makes a mercy mission to save owl eggs from an unexpected predator. Moriarty the hungry crocodile helps himself to a feed in Chris' kitchen. We find out why our world would be turned upside down without bats. It's time for TJ the abandoned kangaroo to leave the comfort of Chris' house and discover the great outdoors. See the heights Chris scales in order to serve 5-star cuisine to his mates at Koala HQ.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S39
programme.desc: (Encore) Hosted by Pat Sajak, this game show features 3 contestants who try to solve a puzzle by spinning the wheel and guessing letters in a word or phrase.

programme.title: A Perfect Planet
programme.desc: From the frozen poles to the searing deserts, this episode shows how animals have come up with strategies to survive the uneven amounts of sunlight that fall on our planet. Examining the solar force that powers Earth and how plants and animals have adapted to the uneven amounts of sunlight given to different parts of the planet over the course of a year. The exception is on the equator, where the duration of day and night remain the same throughout the year.

programme.title: Zoom, Zim, Zam
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday.

programme.title: Hiccup & Sneeze
programme.desc: Hiccup has been invited to join the 'Best Dressed Vegetables' competition, but Sneeze wants to participate too. Hiccup gets discouraged when she thinks Sneeze's costume looks better than hers. However, Bibi encourages her not to give up.

programme.title: GUS The Itsy Bitsy Knight
programme.desc: Follow small, grasshopper-sized boy named Gus who wishes to become the greatest knight in all the kingdom of Karamel! Armed with his laser sword and mounted on his electric pony, Gus will never miss an opportunity to pursue adventure and win the day.

programme.title: Ready Jet Go! S2
programme.desc: After the kids successfully grow potato plants in Jet's back yard garden, Jet wants to try to grow them on Mars. Celery takes them to Mars with some small potato plant sprouts to try their experiment. After the first one instantly freezes, they try to figure out what's missing from Earth that they can provide on Mars, namely a breathable atmosphere, water, and heat. Eventually they make a little greenhouse habitat to successfully grow the potato, a la The Martian.

programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus S1
programme.desc: The adventures of Tayo, a blue bus with the number 120. He is very playful and mischievous with his passengers and his friends.

programme.title: Pinkfong Wonderstar
programme.desc: Pinkfong crashes into the roof of a house, and in doing so, finds a best friend and problem-solving partner named Hogi. Pinkfong has the power to make wishes a reality, and Hogi has gained a lot of knowledge through reading. This inspires them to form Wonderstar', a problem-solving team that serves the townspeople of Wonderville - and beyond!

programme.desc: Preston is destroying mangrove forests in India to create profitable shrimp farms, exposing the area and its wildlife to storms. / The Rangers have to get a lost seal back home after it wreaks havoc on a city!

programme.title: Petronix Defenders
programme.desc: When crises strike wild animals around the planet, a team of heroic seven-year-olds transform their high-tech backpacks into robotic pets and rush off on daring missions to rescue them. This team of heroic kids and their robotic pets stands on call, ready to leap into action when danger strikes animals around the world.

programme.title: Pokemon Master Journeys: The Series S24
programme.desc: It's a big, big world, but you know where to find Ash and Goh---battling and catching Pokemon from Kanto to Galar! With Pikachu, Cinderace, and their other Pokemon beside them, our heroes continue to travel all over the world to research Pokemon for Cerise Laboratory.

programme.title: Super4orce
programme.desc: Jake is suspicious of Vincent's plan to normalize kids. He enlists TJ's help to find some evidence against Vincent. Meanwhile, the new guy at A.T.E.M. Eldred is not what he seems. However, when Joe gets too close to the truth, he accidentally puts one of his friend's life in danger. Now the trio have to unite to save their friend from a villain with many 'personalities'. When they bring the bad kid to Vincent, their mentor decides to normalize the boy of his powers.

But will a trash can turned into a spaceship be enough to convince Cosmo he really is travelling in outer-space on board the pawesomest spaceship ever?

programme.title: HSBC Singapore Rugby Sevens 2023 (Highlights)
programme.desc: The two-day event will feature a star-studded line-up with teams from Argentina, Australia, Canada, Great Britain, Fiji, France, Hong Kong, Ireland, Japan, Kenya, New Zealand, Samoa, South Africa, Spain, Uruguay, USA, and an invitational team. They will battle it out at the Singapore National Stadium to gain ranking points for their climb up the table. The Singapore leg is the ninth of eleven tournaments in the men's HSBC World Rugby Sevens Series 2022/2023 season which started in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Our 2030 Vision

programme.desc: Go beyond Thailand's beaches. Wild Thailand reveals a sacred kingdom of awe-inspiring beauty. It takes in towering limestone cliffs, paddy fields, hidden temples and the teeming city of Bangkok, before visiting the forests of the north. Each episode is packed with wildlife.

programme.desc: The episodes cover the most extreme weather action caught on camera. We learn from survivors who have beaten the odds to overcome the most treacherous weather conditions imaginable. The series also shows how for on-air meteorologists, being on the front lines of Mother Nature is never easy and sometimes the reporter covering the story becomes the story.

programme.title: Blue Planet Now
programme.desc: Travel to the far corners of the planet and discover the secrets of Earth's few remaining untouched lands, all brimming withlife. From the Namib Desert to Patagonia, only a handful of places on Earth can claim to be largely unchanged. Isolated from the rest of the world, these places have been protected from the most damaging effects of human interference. Delicately balanced, species-rich, unique ecosystems. In these lands, life exists as nature intended.

programme.title: A Perfect Planet
programme.desc: Oceans are the largest ecosystem on earth, covering two thirds of our world's surface and providing half the oxygen in our atmosphere. They are home to as much as 80 per cent of all life on earth, and nearly three billion people rely on them for their primary source of food. But our planet's oceans would be little more than stagnant wastelands, and life on earth - not just in the oceans - would cease to exist, were it not for one simple factor: a global network of powerful currents.

programme.desc: (重) 位於屏東縣的三地門鄉，是主要以排灣族為居民的地區。該地區因為幾名藝術家集文化園區的影響，在地有關族群藝術產業的發展非常興盛，可以說是台灣原住民的藝術之鄉，尤其以三地村最具代表性。工藝精湛的陶壺藝術、將排灣族傳統文化融入並發展成現代舞蹈藝術的蒂摩爾古薪舞集藝術團隊都是代表性的成員之一。近年造成風潮的山川琉璃吊橋、以排灣族琉璃珠藝術集神話的概念橫跨在隘寮溪的白色吊橋，更是負擔起帶動周邊旅遊產業的重要建設之一。再往深山一點的三地門鄉德文部落，一直以其咖啡產業較具代表性，海拔約800公尺的德文部落的得萊公.
